name: Forest Path (Kick14)
description:
This game in originally made for BenBonk Game Jam#3.

A Short game on forest escape. This game is made in Renpy.

Story

You found yourself alone in a forest. You don't remember anything, last thing you remember is being hit by a baseball bat -_-.  Now make your way out of the forest. 

I you have any suggestions to improve this game please let me know ;)

M icon is for map and I icon is for inventory.
